personal.name: Utku Ege Tuluk
personal.title: Research Engineer & AI Specialist
personal.bio: Research Engineer and AI specialist with 3+ years developing enterprise-scale educational technology platforms at NYU Shanghai. Architected multimodal learning systems serving 300+ students, processing 100M+ tokens with 5x deployment efficiency gains. Expertise in full-stack development, LLM integration, and production AI infrastructure.

kiwi.title: KIWI - Multimodal AI Learning Platform
kiwi.description: Enterprise-scale multimodal learning platform serving 300+ students across 6 classes, featuring real-time AI-powered chat, intelligent PDF annotation, and in-browser Python execution.
kiwi.longDescription: Built a production-grade educational platform with real-time streaming chat supporting multiple LLMs, AI-powered PDF annotation and highlighting, vector-based document search, and multi-class deployment automation. Processed 100M+ tokens with 5x deployment speed improvement and 99.9% uptime.

ask.title: ASK - Knowledge Base Chatbot Framework
ask.description: Multi-tenant chatbot framework that reduced faculty response times from hours to instant, deployed as 'Ask Angie' for NYU Shanghai faculty support.
ask.longDescription: Developed a customizable multi-tenant chatbot framework with role-based access control, multilingual support (English/Chinese), intelligent document processing pipeline, hybrid vector/text search, and offline text-to-speech integration. Features automatic chunking, embedding generation, and real-time analytics.

vtuber-chat.title: VTuber Chat Helper
vtuber-chat.description: Cross-platform desktop application aggregating real-time chat messages from YouTube, Twitch, and Kick with intelligent message prioritization.
vtuber-chat.longDescription: Built a multi-platform streaming chat aggregator used for 100+ hours of streaming. Features unified message format across platforms, priority message queuing, intelligent flood detection, SuperChat highlighting, and custom notification alerts with OAuth authentication and rate limiting compliance.

spiegel-2d.title: Spiegel 2D - AI VTuber Avatar
spiegel-2d.description: AI-driven Live2D VTuber avatar application featuring real-time lip-sync, emotion-driven expressions, and 60fps rendering with privacy-first local AI.
spiegel-2d.longDescription: Created an AI-powered Live2D avatar system with MFCC-based lip-sync analysis, AI-driven facial expressions, smooth 60fps rendering, and transparent background for OBS integration. Uses local AI models for privacy, Web Workers for non-blocking processing, and WebGPU acceleration.
